H0.text: The 1987 film ‘Cry Freedom’ is a biographical drama about which South African civil rights leader. Nelson Mandela

H1.text: The 1987 film ‘Cry Freedom’ is a biographical drama about which South African civil rights leader. Oliver Tambo

H2.text: The 1987 film ‘Cry Freedom’ is a biographical drama about which South African civil rights leader. Walter Sisulu

H3.text: The 1987 film ‘Cry Freedom’ is a biographical drama about which South African civil rights leader. Steve Biko

A4.text: This was made into the 1987 film Cry Freedom by Richard Attenborough, starring Denzel Washington as Biko.

A5.text: a 1978 biography by his friend Donald Woods formed the basis for the 1987 film Cry Freedom.
